revised_title: Density Expansion of the Zernike-Prins Formula in Fluids Theory
tldr: The authors explore the theory of fluids, focusing on the radial distribution function and direct correlation function. They develop an extension of the equations, improving upon previous theories and providing a better understanding of phase changes in fluids. The study also includes an analysis of X-ray scattering by fluids, offering insights into the behavior of fluids at the atomic level.
